creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr and Mrs Sherman Lee
markings: URC:  画竹三昧{Gachiku sanmai} (Samadhi of painting bamboo); LRC: 不如学斎{Fu’nyo gakusai}; c: 渫菴老人{chō or setsu an rōjin}
signed: LRC: 戊辰春日作土井生{Tsuchinoe tatsu shunnichi saku Doi sei}(Painted on a spring day, 1868, Doi)
title: Rock in the Shape of an Arhat
